TEXT.TITLE: FED BUYS 550 MLN DLRS OF BILLS FOR CUSTOMER
TEXT.BODY: The Federal Reserve bought about 550 mln dlrs of U.S. Treasury bills for a customer, a spokeswoman said. She said the Fed bought bills maturing from May through September 24 for regular delivery tomorrow. Federal funds were trading at 6-3/16 pct when the Fed announced the operation. Reuter
